title: sharanu sharanu surEndhra
sahitya:
caranu caranu surEndra sannuta caranu shrI sashi vallaba
 caranu rAkshasa garva samhara caranu vEnkata nAyaka








caraNam 1





 kamala Darudunu kamala mitrudu kamala chatrudu putrudu
 kramanutO mI koluvukippdu gAchinarecharigaiyA


caraNam 2

 animishEnDrulu munulu Dikpasulamara kinnara siDDulu
 Danatato rambAdi kAntalu gAchinarecharigaiyA


caraNam 3


 yennagala prahlAda muktulu ninnu koluvaa vachiri
 vinnapamu vina yaiya tirupati vEnkatachala nAyaka
